mapper.select: SELECT CLASS_LATE_NO, CLASS_LATE_CONTENT, CLASS_LATE_LIKE, L.CLASS_NO, L.MEMBER_NO , CLASS_NM, MEMBER_NAME FROM CLASS_LATE L JOIN CLASS C ON(C.CLASS_NO = L.CLASS_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_LATE L JOIN CLASS C ON(C.CLASS_NO = L.CLASS_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT CLASS_LATE_NO, CLASS_LATE_CONTENT, CLASS_LATE_LIKE, L.CLASS_NO, L.MEMBER_NO , CLASS_NM, MEMBER_NAME FROM CLASS_LATE L JOIN CLASS C ON(C.CLASS_NO = L.CLASS_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY 1 DESC
